text: "All You Ever Wanted" is a song by English singer-songwriter Rag'n'Bone Man. It was released as a digital download and for streaming on 29 January 2021. It is the lead single from his second studio album Life by Misadventure. The song was written by Ben Jackson-Cook, Mike Elizondo, Natalie Hemby and Rory Graham. == Background == Talking about the song, he said, "I'd felt sad looking around Brighton and London where I grew upâ€¦remembering all those cool places that aren't there anymore." The song was recorded in Tennessee. == Charts == Chart performance for "All You Ever Wanted" Chart (2021) Peak position 2 New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) 25 21 29 == Release history == Release history for "All You Ever Wanted" Region Date Format Label Various 29 January 2021 Sony Music == References == Category:2021 songs
title: All You Ever Wanted (Rag'n'Bone Man song)
